TABLE.NAME: findpartner
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the findpartner activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: minmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Minimum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: maxmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: dateclosusegroups
FIELD.COMMENT: Deadline for students to make groups. When the time comes, the groups get automatically fulfill
